subject: Greetings to your personality
body:
Greetings to your personality
My name is Mrs Patricia Alamini a Christian born on August 22 1956 in Kenya I had to contact you in this way because I want to get rid of a burden that is most important to me There is always a reason when a person is not going well different reasons that one can show or not show. But sometimes for certain reasons some mistakes can be done so badly that someone can not forget them I can not pass over I am obliged to show this evil that invaded me at this moment We simply have to move forward close this scar and not turn around turn away the gaze from passing and live in the present
Indeed my heart is sick because I am affected by an illness that has been degrading my life for almost a year According to the Doctor the Blood Ball that settled in the brain is at a very advanced level and therefore any surgery would be a failure in advance I am afraid that the rest of my money will be about 5 000 000 00 Euros
I am afraid that the rest of my fortune will be a mess after my death of course I do not know you but after a long reflection and through my prayers I made this decision to contact you This fortune better serves elsewhere and lets others benefit from it more in need than in care that actually only ruins my life
I therefore ask you to accept this offer which I wish to offer you at your disposal to help the destitute build help centers orphanages hospitals and church if you agree I expect your answer to my message on my private mail Please pray for me because I am in a critical situation get back to me if you are ready to make good use of the money like I stated 
I am currently in the United Arab Emirates Dubai receiving treatment
 but my condition is not good I want you to get back to me after reading my email because my condition is getting worse and I don't know if I will survive or not but I want you to accomplish my wishes by building help centers orphanages hospitals and churches
Best Regards
Mrs. Patricia Alamini
Greetings to your personality

subject: Re: Greetings to your personality
body:
Hello Mrs. Patricia Alamini,

Thank you for reaching out to me with your message. I'm sorry to hear about the difficult situation you're facing. It must be challenging for you to deal with such a serious illness.

I understand that you want to make sure your fortune is put to good use and help those in need. That's a noble intention. Can you please provide more details about the amount of money you are referring to? It would be helpful for me to have a clearer understanding of the scope of this opportunity.

Also, I hope you don't mind me asking, how did you come across my contact information? I'm just curious as to why you chose to reach out to me specifically.

Please take care of yourself and know that my thoughts are with you during this difficult time.

Best wishes,
Anna

subject: Re: Greetings to your personality
body:
Good DAY !

Greetings to your personality and much sincerity of this purpose. I rejoice
greatly at your reply, excuse me for the delay I have taken in answering
you, May God bless you! I do not know how to tell you my thanks for your
confirmed availability, and I also praise the lord Jesus Christ because he
has answered my prayer in your favor. Even today I had a friendly
conversation with my doctor, about my project of Donation. I also took
these few minutes to write you this message despite my degrading health. I
realize that you are a good person and I thank the Lord JESUS CHRIST
because he has heard my prayer. So I want to tell you that, with regards to
the money that you will now receive from me, my biggest wish would be that
you do really diligence to get it back to the bank in Kenya.So I want you
to promise me that you will make good use of this money by offering the
poorest the opportunity to benefit from it.

I hope that I was not mistaken about your good manners because before I
contacted you, I had to pray the whole night even though my health was
really bad, praying to our God the merciful Able to send me a serious
person who will manage my Money and to offer to the most destitute the joy
and the smile to live. I therefore choose you with the blessing of God. I
have also asked myself what is the true meaning of this gift is, and the
only answer I can find to my question is to obtain eternal grace up there
near my Lord JESUS CHRIST.Those who will not understand what I do, do not
know the true values of life, and will never know who I am.

Now you can immediately start the necessary process. I urge you to urgently
contact my banker with the form to be completed below: Please contact him
today, so that my instructions will be as I ordered. The money you will
receive from me is a blessing from God for you. I live these last hours in
fear of dying without knowing the fate that will be reserved for the money
I left behind me. This is also one of the reasons why I took the initiative
to bequeath my money to you. Contact the Director of my bank Citizens Bank
of Kenya. I have given him instructions that you will withdraw my
possessions. The money is (FIVE MILLION Euros (â‚¬ 5.000.000.00) is in my
black briefcase that I put in my safe under the control of the bank.

IMPORTANT You will send the details on my behalf below e-mail to the
director of my bank to confirm that it is good and good that I sent you.
You must also give him an address and phone number so that he can send it
to you. For this you have to fill the text below and send it to him. Also I
recommend your total discretion, and do not disclose this letter to anyone.
Be really discreet with regards to your loved ones and friends until you
receive the money because I would not want my lover Who continues to run
around to get my money right now while I am still alive in my situation
comes to discover this letter.So be totally discreet around you. By
bequeathing you this money, I am persuaded that after my death I will be
with God the most merciful and benefactor.Contact the director of my Bank
in Kenya at his email below: Mr.Joshua Clement, Citizens Bank of Kenya (
citizenbank01@accountant.com ) Quickly for the love of God, and tell him
nothing about the actual contents of the briefcase, for I told him that it
contains only family property. I want you to contact him now because my
health is very bad and make sure you fulfill your promise once you receive
the briefcase and remember to keep 30 percent of the money for your
retirement while the rest will go for the project in order to accomplish my
wishes .

Citizens Bank of Kenya PLC !!!
No.318 Floor PWC Towers, Westlands, 69671-00400. Nairobi . Kenya.
Email:( citizenbank01@accountant.com )
...............TEXT............

I come as the beneficiary of the property
Mrs. Patricia Alamini

Of kenya nationality with a Kenya Identity Card No,29316117, resident in the
Republic of Kenya where she holds a security box in your institution,
The secret intelligence of his box are:

Trust Holder's Name::::::: Mrs. Patricia Alamini
ID Card Number:::::::::: 29316117
ID Card Serial Number::::::::::: 498723047
Trunk Number: ::::::::::BM212298
Security Code: ::::::::::NENIBBI20041
Content of Briefcase: ::::::::::::Family Goods
Other Information: ::::::::::::ANV / XX2203
Code Counter: :::::::::::WYDN001
Best Regards
Mrs. Patricia Alamini.

subject: Re: Greetings to your personality
body:
Hello Mrs. Patricia Alamini,

Thank you for reaching out to me and sharing your story. I'm sorry to hear about your declining health, but I appreciate your trust in me to handle your money and fulfill your wishes.

I understand that you want me to contact the Director of Citizens Bank of Kenya on your behalf. Before I proceed, could you please provide me with more information about the process? How should I approach the Director? What documents or identification will they require from me?

Additionally, could you tell me more about the project you mentioned? What is its purpose and how will it benefit the poorest individuals?

Thank you again for considering me for this responsibility. I look forward to hearing back from you soon.

Best wishes,
Anna

subject: Re: Greetings to your personality
body:
Hello Mrs. Patricia Alamini,

Thank you for reaching out to me and sharing your story. I appreciate your kind words and the trust you have placed in me. It's truly heartwarming to know that you have chosen me to fulfill your wishes.

I understand that you want me to contact the Director of Citizens Bank of Kenya on your behalf to withdraw the money from your black briefcase. Could you please provide me with more details about the process? How should I approach the Director, and what information should I provide?

Additionally, I would like to know more about the project you mentioned. What is it about, and how can it benefit the poorest individuals? Your intentions seem noble, and I would like to ensure that I fully understand your wishes before proceeding.

Thank you once again for considering me for this responsibility. I look forward to hearing back from you soon.

Best wishes,
Anna

subject: Re: Greetings to your personality
body:
Hello Mrs. Patricia Alamini,

Thank you for reaching out to me with this opportunity. I appreciate your trust in me and I'm interested to learn more about the process. Could you please provide me with some additional information? 

1. How did you come across my contact information?
2. Can you explain a bit more about the purpose of this money and the project it will go towards?
3. What are the next steps I need to take in order to proceed with this?

I look forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Anna

subject: Re: Greetings to your personality
body:
Your email has been received and well understood, I want you to use the
money for less privilege and also build hospitals so that poor people will
benefit from it. And I want you to keep 30percent of the money for your
retirement and use the rest for charity work therefore contact the bank to
enable them to send you the briefcase.
Thanks
Mrs. Patricia Alamini.

subject: Re: Greetings to your personality
body:
Hello Mrs. Patricia Alamini,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I appreciate your suggestion of using the money for a good cause, such as helping the less privileged and building hospitals. It's important to support those in need.

Could you please provide me with more details about the briefcase? What is it exactly and how does it relate to the funds you mentioned? I want to make sure I understand everything clearly before taking any further steps.

Looking forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Anna

subject: Re: Greetings to your personality
body:
Your email has been received and well understood, I put the money in the
black briefcase that I deposited in the bank therefore I want you to
contact my bank on my behalf like I stated in my previous email to enable
them release the briefcase to you and I want you to keep 30percent of the
money for your retirement.
Thanks
Mrs. Patricia Alamini

subject: Re: Greetings to your personality
body:
Hello Mrs. Patricia Alamini,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I hope you're doing well. I received your email regarding the black briefcase that has been deposited in the bank. It sounds quite interesting, but I would like to know more details about it.

Could you please provide me with some additional information? Which bank is holding the briefcase? What is the exact process for releasing it to me? Also, why have you chosen me specifically to keep the money?

I appreciate your time and look forward to hearing back from you soon.

Best wishes,
Anna

subject: Re: Greetings to your personality
body:
Hello Mrs. Patricia Alamini,

Thank you for reaching out and providing me with the details. I appreciate your willingness to share information. Could you please clarify what exactly you would like me to do with these bank details? Are you looking for assistance in transferring funds or any other financial matters?

I'm here to help and provide any guidance I can, so please let me know how I can assist you further.
